title: Unable to connect chat
body:
getting this error after login last week, and today its still actual. Have it on other accounts I use as well... How to get this solved? Cause I have seen lots of other discussions regarding this error, none has an solution yet. Is this known by RIOT?

Any1 can help me on this? Its quite annoying...

Cheers,

replies.body: This is currently a known issue and working on a fix where some players can't connect to chat.  As a possible workaround for now, try logging off your friends app if you are logged in to that.  We'll provide updates in our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#euw) page.  I hope that helps!
